cu.explanation_en: Changing gNB_ID from string to number causes type mismatch, leading to JSON parsing errors or configuration rejection by the system.

du.explanation_en: Setting remote N address to an unreachable IP causes wrong routing, preventing F1-U connection to CU and causing interface setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 地址設定為無法到達的 IP 會導致路由錯誤，防止 F1-U 連接到 CU，並造成介面設定失敗。
